applet_name: Quickly create events in a Google Calendar
applet_description: Download the IFTTT app to access the Note widget on your device. Then all you have to do is launch the widget and enter a description like "Meeting with Jonathan at 3:30 on June 10th" and the event will be created on your calendar with the correct date and time. The more specific your description, the better! For more info on widgets: https://ifttt.com/help/applets-with-widgets

applet_name: Get a notification for birthday events in your calendar
applet_description: Don't miss an important birthday! This Applet searches for the word "birthday" in an event's title or description and sends you a notification once the event starts.
applet_Action: Send a notification from the IFTTT app

applet_name: Sync new events added from an iOS Calendar to your GCal
applet_description: This Applet will locate and copy over any new event added from an iOS Calendar to a Google Calendar you choose.
applet_Trigger: New event added to specific calendar

applet_name: Track your work hours in Google Calendar
applet_description: All you have to do is set your work location and any time you arrive or leave the area, it will be automatically added to a calendar for easy tracking.
applet_Trigger: You enter or exit an area

applet_name: LINE notify for new calendar schedule
applet_description: LINE notify for new calendar schedule

applet_name: Every day at 6 AM, add today's weather report to your calendar
applet_description: Every morning at 6 AM, the weather report for the day will be added to your Google Calendar.

applet_description: athan in home

applet_name: Automatically sync your Amazon Alexa To Do List with your Google Calendar
applet_description: For each new item you add to Alexa's To Do List this Applet will automatically create an event in Google Calendar at the same time.
applet_Trigger: Item added to your To Do List

applet_name: Copy new events to calendar
applet_description: Copy new events from one calendar to another. Useful for transferring subscribed calendar events to a personal Google calendar that Google Assistant can see or a shared calendar.

applet_name: Automatically create Google Calendar events for new Todoist tasks
applet_description: Stay organized and efficient: Automatically add a new event to your calendar when you add a new task to Todoist.

applet_name: If any new Google Calendar event, create Todoist task
applet_description: Any time you create a new event in Google Calendar, a new Todoist task is created, as well.

applet_name: Log phone calls to Google calendar
applet_description: Log phone calls to Google calendar

applet_name: Log all google calendar entries in a Google Spreadsheet
applet_description: Logs all newly created events into a spreadsheet in Google Drive.

applet_name: IOS Calendar to Google Calendar
applet_description: Any new IOS calendar entry automatically added to Google Calendar #planyourwebsite
applet_Trigger: New event added to any calendar

applet_name: Google Calendar Events to Spreadsheet
applet_description: Add your events to a spreadsheet and then export for analysis or do it right inside Google Sheets!

applet_name: Add Strava runs and rides to Google Calendar
applet_description: Create Google Calendar entry for new Strava run and ride activities.

applet_name: Add any new iOS Reminder to Google Calendar
applet_description: This Applet adds any new iOS reminder from any list to your Google calendar.

applet_name: Get a notification ~15 minutes before your next GCal event starts
applet_description: Get a notification ~15 minutes before your next GCal event starts
applet_Action: Send a notification from the IFTTT app

applet_name: Copy events between calendars
applet_description: Copy events between calendars

applet_description: A simple way to keep a call log. This will record the time of call, the number that's calling and the contact name.

applet_name: Always be prepared for the weather
applet_description: Never get caught without a winter coat or umbrella! This Applet will send you a mobile notification, email, and create a calendar event when rain is in the forecast.

applet_description: Create a TickTick task and it will create a Google Calendar Event. If no time is set it will be an all-day event, if there is a date and time due, it will create it also in Google Calendar.

applet_name: 4sq check-ins (now Swarm) to Google Calendar
applet_description:
Backup all your foursquare (swarm) checkins into a Google calendar to make them visible and searchable ("When was the last time I was at the North Pole Pub?").

Best use is to create a new calendar (e.g. "Checkins") so you can hide all check-ins if your agenda looks too busy.

applet_name: When a meeting starts, automatically mute your Android ringtone
applet_description: This Applet monitors a Google Calendar you choose and every time a meeting on that calendar ends, your Android device's ringtone will be muted. Use this complimentary Applet to turn the ringtone back on after an event ends: https://ifttt.com/applets/ShzmBfSN

applet_description: Adding an event to your Google calendar will get inserted into Todoist at the time the event starts. This is extremely helpful for tasks that need attention weeks or months away :)
